actions.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
Amendment in the nature of a substitute reported by the House Committee on Rules.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment in the nature of a substitute reported by the House Committee on Rules.
House amendment considered as adopted: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

description: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 458, the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Small Business now printed in the bill, modified by the amendment printed in part B of House Report 119-130 is considered as adopted.
